ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board
Class GameBoardLine

java.lang.Object
  ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board.GameBoardSlotCollection
      ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board.GameBoardLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serial, java.lang.Iterable<GameBoardSlot>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameBoardColumn, GameBoardRow
public abstract class GameBoardLine
extends GameBoardSlotCollection

Represents any kind of line on the GameBoard. Abstracts commonly columns / rows on the board.

Version:
1.0, 13.10.2011
Author:
Markus Vetsch
